inclusion.criterion: All mothers, over 18 years of age, of newborns hospitalized in neonatal medicine at the University Hospital Center (CHU) - Félix GUYON Hospital during the study period.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Expressed no opposition from mothers to their participation and to the use of their data
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Mother not hospitalized in the maternity ward of Félix Guyon Hospital
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prognosis for the child engaged in the first 24 hours
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 41-year-old obese woman with abdominal pain and vomiting, diagnosed with acute edematous interstitial pancreatitis due to gall stone pancreatitis.
